wantedvideomaindriver 0 # -1 none, 0 gdi, 1 directdraw, 2 direct3d window, 3 direct3d fullscreen
wantedvideosubdriver 0 # 0 subdevice 0 ati rage pro, 1 subdevice 1 voodoo 2 etc.
wantedaudiomaindriver 1 # -1 none, 0 waveplayer, 1 directsound
wantedaudiosubdriver 0 # 0 subdevice 0 RipTide Playback, 1 subdevice 1 Game Compatible Device etc.
wantedaudiomicsubdriver 0 # 0 subdevice for mic
wantedusedirectinput 0 # -1 none (later), 0 message based, 1 directinput (keyboard, mouse and joystick)
mousemode 0 # 0 normal, 1 infinite
